description.p: In his absence, a fierce storm has engulfed the land, imperiling all those who dare to stray outside. Only the legendary dragon can calm the savage rains, but the beacons that lead him home have fallen from their pedestals.
It falls to Amaya Shimizu, the young shrine maiden, to brave the storm, recover the scattered beacons, and guide Kuraokami homeâ€¦

Hello there! Here's a quick update to Amaya that I put together when I should have been packing for GodotCon.

ul.li: Made the game restart after you finish

description.p: Thank you to everyone who played, rated, and left feedback for Amaya! We're thrilled to have won. This first post-jam update contains the following changes:

ul.li: Fixed a bug where Amaya would stutter on the edge of a cliff
Fixed a bug where Amaya's momentum would "freeze" during a hard landing
Fixed a bug where firepots would still heat buckets even when extinguished
Changed the speed at which objects on pulleys ascend/descend
Added a sound effect when pushing an object
Made various graphical tweaks and improvements

description.p: Initial release for Godot Wild Jam #58
